article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for WS A &A Delegation Service
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating from GT4.0
section.para: This version is not compatible with the GT4 version of Delegation Service because of protocol changes. To migrate to this version, this component needs to be installed completely independent of any current GT4 Delegation Service installs.

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.para: This was a new component in Globus 4.0.

section.title: Migrating from GT2
section.para: This was a new component in Globus 4.0.
